Class RateLimiter.BucketBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.gpluscb.ggjava.api.RateLimiter.BucketBuilder
  • Enclosing interface:
    RateLimiter

    public static class RateLimiter.BucketBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    Used for building instances of RateLimiter that respect a bucket system.
    See Also:
    RateLimiter.bucketBuilder()
